scenario_text.value:
(Kaito and Labramon have been following me
silently...)
(Because I’m so pathetic...)

(This won’t do... I have to tell them I’m all
right...)
Um...
Aoi? What is it?
Errr... I’m all...

(All right? Can I say it...? Even though they
don’t understand a thing?)

Hmm? What’s up? You got something to say,
just come out and say it.
(It’s not like Saki wanted to die.)

(Saki told me she was scared, after all.
Even so...)

Saki...made a decision so that all of us
could live. That’s...what we should believe?
That’s what I think.

(Really... Would Saki really be happy with
that?)

(Can we say she didn’t regret it the moment
she let go? Did she really want to save us?)

(And why didn’t I try to grab her hand again
in the first place...?)

(Could it be I was...relieved? That Saki let
go for me?)
Aoi, are you all right?!

(Damn! At this rate things will be like
before.)
Sorry, you two. I’m really okay now, honest.
Haru? Is that you?!
Haru?! That dork’s still alive?!
No way!
Haru!
Haru, wait! Can’t you hear me? Hey, stop!

Don’t go that way! It’s dangerous to be out
here alone!
Yo, Aoi! You ain’t running off too, are you?!

Of course! I can’t leave Haru to fend for
himself!

I’ll stop him... This time I’ll do it for
sure!
Wait, Aoi! I’ll go with you!
Crap! Guess I’m going too, then...

Ahh, wait, no no no! If I go, we’ll be
totally isolated from the others...

I gotta hurry back to school and tell the
others what’s what!
